<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/54984</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>54984</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_342</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_342</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Potencias y raíces</string>
            <string language="en">Powers and roots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energien und Wurzeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puissances et racines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potências e raizes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenzi e radici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις και ρίζες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de potencia y raíz cuadrada. Se estudian las potencias de números enteros y se relaciona el concepto de raíz cuadrada como operación inversa de la operación elevar al cuadrado.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of power and square root. It studies the powers of integers and studies the concept of square root as an operation which is the opposite of squaring</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">exponente</string>
            <string language="en">exponent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">potencia</string>
            <string language="en">power</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">raíz cuadrada</string>
            <string language="en">square root</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">elevar al cuadrado</string>
            <string language="en">squaring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">entero</string>
            <string language="en">integer</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der Energie und der Quadratwurzel zu 
erklären. Es studiert die Energien von Ganzzahlen und studiert 
das Konzept der Quadratwurzel als Operation, die das Entgegengesetzte 
des Quadrierens ist</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de la puissance et de la racine 
carrée. Il étudie les puissances des nombres entiers et 
étudie le concept de la racine carrée comme exécution qui est 
l'opposé d'ajuster</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito da potência e da raiz quadrada. Estuda as potências
dos inteiros e estuda o conceito da raiz quadrada como uma operação 
que seja o oposto de esquadrar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto di potenza e della radice quadrata. Studia 
le potenzi dei numeri interi e studia il concetto della radice 
quadrata come funzionamento che è l'opposto di quadrare</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της δύναμης και της τετραγωνικής 
ρίζας. Μελετά τις δυνάμεις των ακέραιων αριθμών και μελετά
την έννοια της τετραγωνικής ρίζας ως λειτουργία που είναι το 
αντίθετο της τακτοποίησης</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Exponent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quadratwurzel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quadrieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ganzzahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exposant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">puissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">racine carrée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ajuster</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nombre entier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exponente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">potência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raiz quadrada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esquadrar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inteiro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esponente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">potenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radice quadrata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quadrare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">numero intero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκθέτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τετραγωνική ρίζα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τακτοποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακέραιος αριθμός</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
